utils.kernel_ext(mat, tol=0.01)[source]¶

Computes input matrix’s kernel, defined as the vector space spanned by the eigenvectors corresponding to 1% of the sum of the squared singular values.

#TODO: this is basically just the SVD, all lines between that and the return are useless.
